rooms.name: A Mountain Path
rooms.description:
You are on a mountain path which ascends a steep mountainside.  The trail
curves around the mountain so that you cannot really see what lies ahead.
You do sense great power though coming from the area behind the mountain.

rooms.name: A Mountain Path
rooms.description:
You are on a rocky mountain path leading up and around a steep mountainside.
You sense a glow from the area beyond the mountain, which you cannot see yet.

rooms.name: Mountainside Tombs
rooms.description:
There are a few stone heaps here and there, the tombs of those who did not
last the arduous journey up the mountain.  Curiously you notice a few
uncovered bodies which don't seem to have died of exhaustion.  The path curves
east around the mountain.

extra_descriptions.description: They look as if their necks have been broken and their flesh, chewed.

You are sure glad that YOU aren't under one of those piles!
Many of the tombstones have the same name on them, 'Raff'.  He must come
here a lot.

rooms.name: A Blind Curve on the Mountain Path.
rooms.description:
This looks like a normal mountain path, but it is NOT!  This section of the
path is habitated by a huge (and of course, man-eating) Cyclops.  The path
makes its final ascent to an overlook.

rooms.name: Vista
rooms.description:
This is a stunning vista overlooking a canyon.  There is a sign here that says:
BEHOLD -- ELEMENTAL CANYON
Fire leaps up from firepits in the western part of the canyon.  The sky looks
funny, and the air seems hazy to the northwest.  Electricity sparks
intermittently in the northeast.  To the east you see a strong, magic-looking
river flowing through the canyon.  Also to the east you spy a cave entrance
leading into the canyon wall.  The path descends to the north to another
overlook.

rooms.name: The Overlook
rooms.description:
You see various elemental servants wandering around the canyon.  The noise of
humming coming from the canyon gets louder.  The path makes a steep descent
into the canyon here.

rooms.name: Entrance to Elemental Canyon
rooms.description:
You are awed by the sounds and sights of great powers at works here.
Elemental servants bustle back and forth doing the biddings of the elemental
rulers.  You see a sort of cross roads to the north, and you can climb up to
the overlook here.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at all.
In general, it is calm, yet there is always a incessant buzz of things
going on about.  The canyon continues north and east.

rooms.name: Elemental Gateway
rooms.description:
To the west a path dips and winds among some flowing firepits.  To the
northeast a path goes toward the river.  Beyond toward the northeast and
northwest are outcrops which rise up from the canyon floor. To the east there
is a cave mouth which leads into the canyon wall.  And to the south the path
leads up, away, and out of the canyon.  Various pure and cross-breeds of
elemental forms wander the canyon floor, which extends in a wide swath
northwards.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always a incessant buzz of
things going on about.  The canyon floor extends north and west.  There is a
cave mouth set into the canyon wall to the east.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always an incessant buzz of
things going on about.  The canyon floor extends off to the north, east,
and south.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always an incessant buzz of
things going on about.  The canyon floor extends in all directions.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always an incessant buzz of
things going on about.  The canyon floor extends north, south, and west.
A path follows a stream to the east.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always an incessant buzz of
things going on about. The canyon floor extends north, east, and south.
To the west a garden is on fire.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always an incessant buzz of
things going on about.  The canyon floor extends in all directions.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always an incessant buzz of
things going on about.  The Canyon floor extends north, south and west.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always an incessant buzz of
things going on about. The canyon floor extends east and south.  You can
climb a rise in the canyon floor to the north.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always an incessant buzz of
things going on about.  The canyon floor extends east, south, and west.

rooms.name: The Floor of the Canyon
rooms.description:
Various elemental forms wander the floor of the canyon.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always an incessant buzz of
things going on about.  The canyon floor extends south and west.  You can
climb a rise in the canyon floor to the north.

rooms.name: Dark Cave
rooms.description:
You notice a path winding east among some huge boulders.  You feel a powerful
source of energy from that direction.

rooms.name: Darker Caves
rooms.description:
You can barely see your way even with a light source.  The rocks of the cave
are even darker than the darkness.  You hear a powerful humming all around
you.  Cave paths go south and east roughly, its hard to tell exactly when you
can't see where you are going.

rooms.name: Darker Caves
rooms.description:
You can barely see your way even with a light source.  The rocks of the cave
are even darker than the darkness.  You hear a powerful humming all around
you.  Cave paths go south and west roughly; it's hard to tell exactly when you
can't see where you are going.

rooms.name: Darker Caves
rooms.description:
You can barely see your way even with a light source.  The rocks of the cave
are even darker than the darkness.  You hear a powerful humming all around you.
Cave paths go north, south and east roughly; it's hard to tell exactly when
you can't see where you are going.

rooms.name: Darker Caves
rooms.description:
You can barely see your way even with a light source.  The rocks of the cave
are even darker than the darkness.  You hear a powerful humming all around you.
Cave paths go north, south and west roughly, it's hard to tell exactly when you
can't see where you are going.

rooms.name: Darkest Caves
rooms.description:
Your light doesn't even seem to work here.  Even magical light sources seem
only to illuminate about a foot ahead of you.  You suddenly realize that the
path has descended quite a bit but you didn't notice before because of the
darkness.  You sense a great presence off to the east aways.

rooms.name: Darkest Caves
rooms.description:
Your light doesn't even seem to work here.  Even magical light sources seem
only to illuminate about a foot ahead of you.  You suddenly realize that the
path has descended quite a bit but you didn't notice before because of the
darkness.  You sense a great presence directly to the east.

rooms.name: Earth Chamber
rooms.description:
This is the abode of the Earth Ruler.  He decides about earthquakes,
landslides, and avalanches.  The Earth Ruler sits upon a huge marble throne
carved into the wall.

extra_descriptions.description:
The ruler notices your stare, and doesn't like it one bit!  The whole
earth seems to shake with his emotion.

rooms.name: By the River
rooms.description:
The water in the river seems to bubble and froth with magic.  Though it
splashes playfully on you, it does not seem wet.  The path leads north closer
to the water. To the west you see a T-intersection.

rooms.name: In the River
rooms.description:
To continue you had to walk right in the river.  Though you walk along in
water up to your knees, you do not seem to get wet.  A bay stretches out to
the north and the river goes south.

rooms.name: Elemental Bay
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  Then you realize you are walking on the water itself.  Truly
magical water indeed.  Though you splash through the bay you do not get wet.

rooms.name: Elemental Bay
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  Then you realize you are walking on the water itself.  Truly
magical water indeed.  Though you splash through the bay you do not get wet.

rooms.name: Elemental Bay
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  Then you realize you are walking on the water itself.  Truly
magical water indeed.  Though you splash through the bay you do not get wet.

rooms.name: Elemental Bay
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  Then you realize you are walking on the water itself.  Truly
magical water indeed.  Though you splash through the bay you do not get wet.

rooms.name: Elemental Bay
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  Then you realize you are walking on the water itself.  Truly
magical water indeed.  Though you splash through the bay you do not get wet.

rooms.name: Elemental Bay
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  Then you realize you are walking on the water itself.  Truly
magical water indeed.  Though you splash through the bay you do not get wet.

rooms.name: Water Chamber
rooms.description:
This chamber was magically created here on the floor of the bay.  It looks
like it's been here for a long, long time.  Though you are 'under water' there
is no difficulty breathing normally, and oddly you do not feel the pressure of
the water above you.

rooms.name: A Fiery Pathway
rooms.description:
You tread carefully along a path which dips and turns among geysers of fire.
Miniature volcanoes spew lava in rivers.  The fire is hot but not altogether
dangerous.  The path extends east and south.

rooms.name: A Fiery Pathway
rooms.description:
You tread carefully along a path which dips and turns among pits of fire and
beds of coals.  A garden to the west glows with an everlasting fire.

rooms.name: The Burning Gardens
rooms.description:
Everywhere around you the landscape is afire; the rocks, the shrubs and even
the air seems to be aflame.  Curiously, the magical fire does not seem to
consume its hosts.  A path leads east among some fire pits.

rooms.name: The Fire Chamber
rooms.description:
The fire ruler sits upon a throne made of blue flame.  Little flickers of
flame dance to and fro for the entertainment of the ruler.

rooms.name: Electric Pathway
rooms.description:
The pathway glows and hums because of the electricity pulsing through it.
It seems almost soothing to your weary feet.  To the north there is a
sunken-in area.  A path leads east also.

rooms.name: The Electric Playground
rooms.description:
Though there is a seemingly carefree atmosphere here, you sense that
something much more important takes place near by.  The electric playground
extends north and east.

rooms.name: The Electric Playground
rooms.description:
Though there is a seemingly carefree atmosphere here, you sense that
something much more important takes place near by.  There is an electric
path heading away south.  The playground extends north and west.

rooms.name: The Electric Playground
rooms.description:
Though there is a seemingly carefree atmosphere here, you sense that
something much more important takes place near by.  The playground continues
south and east.

rooms.name: The Electric Playground
rooms.description:
Though there is a seemingly carefree atmosphere here, you sense that
something much more important takes place near by.  The playground is
south and west.  Something more important catches your eye to the east.

rooms.name: Lightning Causeway
rooms.description:
Up a set of stairs carved into the hill you see intermittent flashes of
lightning.  A continuous hum also comes form that direction.  To the west
is the electric playground.

rooms.name: Lightning Chamber
rooms.description:
There is some sort of control panel here. Apparently the Lightning Ruler
observes and controls electric forces from here.  A set of steps carved into
the hill lead down to a causeway.

rooms.name: Mesa West
rooms.description:
An electric path starts to the west.  The mesa continues to the east.
Or you can climb down to the canyon floor to the south.

rooms.name: Mesa East
rooms.description:
A path starts to the north.  The mesa continues to the west.
Or you can climb down to the canyon floor to the south.

rooms.name: Floating in Air
rooms.description:
Last you knew, you were walking on the mesa.  Abruptly the path dropped
from beneath your feet much to quick for you to recover.  Instead of
plunging to your death, you seemingly miss the ground and begin walking
on air.  The space to the north and east seems just thin air, but you can
walk there.  The pathway you came from is to the south.

rooms.name: Floating in Air
rooms.description:
You look down and see the ground 100 feet below you.  The wind whispering
in your ear seems to reassure you that this is fine.  To the north aways
you spy a portal of sorts.  To the west is more thin air.

rooms.name: Floating in Air
rooms.description:
You look down and see the ground 100 feet below you.  The wind whispering
in your ear seems to reassure you that this is fine.  To the east aways
you spy a portal of sorts.  To the south is more thin air.

rooms.name: Floating in Air
rooms.description:
You look down and see the ground 100 feet below you.  The wind whispering
in your ear seems to reassure you that this is fine. There is a portal
hanging in midair here. It is to the east.  You can float south or west
if you'd like.

extra_descriptions.description: Through the portal you see a tunnel.

rooms.name: Windy Tunnel
rooms.description:
A tunnel leads east.  To the west you can enter a portal. The wind in
this tunnel is quite fierce, it seems as if it's forced.

extra_descriptions.description: Through the portal you see nothing but sky.

rooms.name: Air Chamber
rooms.description:
Tiny tornadoes come and go and dance along the ground here.  At the back
of the chamber you notice a huge throne made of swirling clouds.
A tunnel leads west.

extra_descriptions.description:
Although the cloud throne appears solid enough to sit on, I wouldn't try
it if I were you!

mobiles.name: the mountain climber
mobiles.description: A mountain climber is making the same trek that you are.

mobiles.name: the cyclops
mobiles.description: A hungry cyclops snarls at you!

mobiles.name: a tiny elemental
mobiles.description: A tiny elemental form wanders about.

mobiles.name: the elemental guardian
mobiles.description: The elemental guardian of the canyon.

mobiles.name: a small elemental
mobiles.description: A small, rather non-descript elemental.

mobiles.name: a medium elemental
mobiles.description: A medium-sized elemental.

mobiles.name: a large elemental
mobiles.description: A large elemental.

mobiles.name: the Earth Ruler
mobiles.description: The Ruler of the earth elementals.

mobiles.name: the Fire Ruler
mobiles.description: The Ruler of the fire elementals.

mobiles.name: The Air Ruler
mobiles.description: The Ruler of the air elementals.

mobiles.name: The Lightning Ruler
mobiles.description: The Ruler of the lightning elementals.

mobiles.name: The Water Ruler
mobiles.description: The Ruler of the water elementals.

mobiles.name: a puddle
mobiles.description: A small puddle of water elemental.

mobiles.name: a flame
mobiles.description: A small flickering flame elemental.

mobiles.name: a small snowflake
mobiles.description: A frozen snowflake water elemental.

mobiles.name: a small rock
mobiles.description: A small rock.

mobiles.name: a small spark
mobiles.description: A small spark of electricity fizzles here.

mobiles.name: a small blob of acid
mobiles.description: A small blob of acid aimlessly eats away at the stone.

mobiles.name: a lava beast
mobiles.description: A lava beast spews from place to place.

mobiles.name: a mud monster
mobiles.description: A mud monster slops around.

mobiles.name: an elemental mist
mobiles.description: The air is magically misty here.

mobiles.name: a particle
mobiles.description: A sub-atomic particle is too small for you to see.

mobiles.name: a dust cloud
mobiles.description: A dust cloud blowing by makes you sneeze.

mobiles.name: an eddie
mobiles.description: A small eddie current swirls junk around here.

mobiles.name: the Blue Flame
mobiles.description: The Blue Flame burns mysteriously here.

mobiles.name: the Magneto
mobiles.description: The Magneto considers zapping you for the heck of it.

mobiles.name: the Ice Bandit
mobiles.description: The Ice Bandit strikes cold fear in your heart.

mobiles.name: the Rock Monster
mobiles.description: The Rock Monster considers you in stoney silence.

mobiles.name: the Hurricane
mobiles.description: A Hurricane rages across the sky.

mobiles.name: an elemental magician
mobiles.description: An elemental magician seeks magical stones for a spell.

mobiles.name: a rainbow warrior
mobiles.description: A warrior of the Rainbow Cult swears his loyalty.

mobiles.name: an illusionist
mobiles.description: The illusionist seeks the aid of the elemental forces.

mobiles.name: an alchemist
mobiles.description: An alchemist wanders by in search of magical herbs.

mobiles.name: a baby rainbow dragon
mobiles.description: A baby rainbow dragon plays among the elements here.

mobiles.name: a little imp
mobiles.description: A little imp runs along being annoying.

mobiles.name: a HUGE elemental
mobiles.description: A HUGE elemental form stands here.

mobiles.name: the elixir vendor
mobiles.description: A vendor is willing to sell you elixirs.

objects.name: the earth ring
objects.description: A dark ring which seems to absorb all the light around it lies here.

objects.name: a stoney breastplate
objects.description: A breastplate made of the stone from deep within the earth lies here.

objects.name: a fiery dagger
objects.description: A dagger made of fire crackles mysteriously here.

objects.name: a flame red cape
objects.description: A cape made of ethereal red fiber lies neatly folded on the ground here.

objects.name: the wind boots
objects.description: A pair of boots that look fast standing still are here.

objects.name: a hurricane helmet
objects.description: A helmet that looks like it has weathered many storms has been set here.

objects.name: a sparking lightning sword
objects.description: A lightning bolt fashioned into a sword spits sparks here.

objects.name: an electric shield
objects.description: A shield made entirely of energy buzzes here.

objects.name: an icy girth
objects.description: A girth made of magical ice has been left here.

objects.name: a waterfall cloak
objects.description: A cloak fashioned from a small magical waterfall is here.

objects.name: an elemental amulet
objects.description: An amulet depicting fire, water, lightning, earth, and air lies here.

objects.name: an elemental bracelet
objects.description: A bracelet made of elemental magic lies here.

objects.name: a platinum arm band
objects.description: A platinum arm band, once worn by the Cyclops, lie here.

objects.name: some platinum leg bands
objects.description: A pair of platinum leg bands, once worn by the Cyclops, lie here.

objects.name: elemental wand of fire
objects.description: A fire wand lies forgotten on the ground.

objects.name: an ice staff
objects.description: An ice staff lies forgotten on the ground.

objects.name: an elemental rod of earthquake
objects.description: An earthquake rod lies forgotten on the ground.

objects.name: elemental wand of wind and air
objects.description: An air wand lies forgotten on the ground.

objects.name: elemental wand of lightning
objects.description: A lightning wand lies forgotten on the ground.

objects.name: a stone club
objects.description: A large stone club lies on the ground.

objects.name: a lodestone
objects.description: A dull red rock lies here amid the weeds.

objects.name: a lava lamp
objects.description: A lantern which glows with a red glowing light has been dumped.

objects.name: an energy scroll
objects.description: A scroll of energy replacement lies here.

objects.name: a water jug
objects.description: A large but surprisingly light jug of water stands here.

objects.name: magic dust
objects.description: A pile of dust of appearance has gathered here.

objects.name: a flame lance
objects.description: A lance of blue flame burns the ground around it.

objects.name: an icicle
objects.description: A glowing icicle dagger lies here amid a patch of frost.

objects.name: the avalanche
objects.description: An avalanche is about to crush you!

objects.name: the morning star
objects.description: A chain with a star on the end lies here.

objects.name: the Shock Whip
objects.description: A whip hums innocently too itself.

objects.name: anti-cyclops elixir
objects.description: An elixir to ward off cyclopi has been bought then left behind here.
